app.title.original: The world's first Crypto Country and Economy on Blockchain
app.title: Create your own bit country
home.features.title: What is Bit.Country?
home.features.countries.details: Create your own bit country and community. Attract more people to join using the rules and policies you can set by your will. Grow your country and monetize your community in multiple ways without any intermediaries.
home.features.blocks.details: Content will belong to one of the blocks that make up the whole country. Each block has a topic the content within should adhere to. People can easily visit neighboring blocks while within a block, so placing related topics next to each other is favourable.
home.features.residents.details: Explore countries created by other people. Become a resident and join the community. Countries can set their residencial policies. Some welcome everyone and even reward you for joining, while others may need you to apply for residency.
home.features.economy.details: Create a currency for your country, and incentivize the people who contribute to your community. As your community grows, your currency will gain value on the exchange. Everyone in the community will benefit from this. Countries can be auctioned, rewarding all who had a stake in it.
home.topCountry.title: Popular Countries
home.roadmap.title: Roadmap
home.roadmap.stage1.details: Bit.Country open to early access. Content creation & primary community activites released, reward platform, and invitation system.
home.roadmap.stage2.details: Progressively release features related to Governing, ownership and bit country creation. Improve existing adding better functionality to content creation.
home.roadmap.stage4.details: Enable Cross-chain NFT Asset support from different chain.
home.roadmap.stage5.details: Launch Parachain Bonding process to obtain the parachain slot.
home.roadmap.stage6.details: Bit.Country opens to all. Governing and ownership features established. Marketplace for trading and auctions enabled. Extra functionality integrated into core experience.
home.buyNow.details: Rule your bit country and economy
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question.1.title: Do I need to use Metamask?
faq.question.1.answer:
No, you don't need to use Metamask if you only participate in the social activities.

If you wish to create a country, or withdraw your currency onto the block chain, you will need Metamask.
faq.question.1.more: Click here to learn more about Metamask
faq.question.2.title: Will my assets always exist?
faq.question.2.answer: Yes, it's nearly impossible for content on the blockchain to be erased. Even if a bit country bans blockchain, the content will continue to exist on other nodes.
faq.question.2.more: Click here for information on the blockchain
faq.question.3.title: How do I put my country up for auction?
faq.question.3.answer: You will find a link in the sidebar on the country page that will take you to the create auction page.
faq.question.4.title: Can I change my mind on a country auction?
faq.question.4.answer:
No, once the auction is created it is run by the auction smart contract. Unless the auction doesn't reach the desired reserve the auction will complete.

Make sure you are certain you want to auction and set a reasonable reserve to avoid any undesirable outcomes.
